welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Alquizar, Cuba! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to immerse yourself in our vibrant community and discover all that Alquizar has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Playa Baracoa Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Jose Marti International Airport, serving most major airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights within Cuba.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Jose Marti International Airport, serving primarily international flights to and from the United States.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may experience slow speeds during peak hours.
